title: The Return of Captain Invincible
creator_credit: Seven Keys, Willarra and Philippe Mora
brief_description: Captain Invincible was once the world’s greatest super-hero before he was falsely accused of treason and dishonourably discharged from active service 30 years ago. The United States President calls on his childhood hero, now aging and an alcoholic, to save the world from the evil Mr Midnight. Stars Alan Arkin, Christopher Lee with Kate Fitzpatrick, Bill Hunter and Graham Kennedy.
